name: Celestial Lighthouse
description:
In Celestial Lighthouse, you must place blocks on strange planets with circular gravity. Place the indicated amount of blocks on the planet to win, or play endless mode and try to fit as many blocks into the atmosphere as you can.  My submission for js13k 2021.

Controls:

  • Mouse: Move block
  • Left click: Place block
  • Mouse Wheel/Arrow keys: Rotate Block
  • R: Restart
  • ESC: Exit to level select
